payload.text: If you are approving your account using the offline method, your financial adviser will clarify what they require from you. Please contact your financial adviser for further information.
Our 'Help and Support' page provides a step-by-step explanation of the offline approval process. To see this, please select the 'Open page' button.
If you are approving your account using the offline method, your financial adviser will clarify what they require from you. Please contact your financial adviser for further information.
